roleset.name: cause an effect

example.name: perilous example
example.text: [Mr. Dang]-1 is alleged [*-1]-2 to have used the account of Singapore hotel and property magnate Ong Beng Seng [*-2] to effect the transactions.

example.name: proper lexical item
example.text: But even if he effects a Hyde-to-Jekyll transformation, he will face a serious ideological crisis and Reunification Scenario Two.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'effect' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.The difference between 'effect' and 'affect' is one of the greatpitfalls of English. 'Affect' means to influence, 'effect' means tobring about or execute.
